website_summaries.verdict: A higher-end model by a popular manufacturer. Offers a lot for the price, including a velvety-soft design and extensive warranty.
pros: Automatic shutoff, dual controls, and numerous heat settings in a velvet plush material
Temperature-adjusting Thermofine system creates consistent warmth
cons: Feels heavy and tends to slip off the bed
Some reports of malfunctioning after a few months, but the long warranty provides peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING!!!  Slides to one side of bed EVERY NIGHT & already has heating problem -- after just 2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote an earlier review, but have since changed my mind! I regret ever having purchased this sorry product. It slides to one side of the bed EVERY night!! Plus, on one side it heats only to about half as warm as the other side on full high. We needed to replace our previous Sunbeam electric blanket that was given to us 31 years ago as a wedding gift -- blanket just started having problems a few months ago. So, the obvious choice seemed to be Sunbeam -- didn't read the frustrating review. A total waste of money, in my opinion. AVOID unless you like to chase a faulty product around the sheets every night.
customer_reviews.author: Koddee

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The blanket does not heat on one side and did not from when I received it. I should have returned it immediately. I have purchased sunbeam products before and do not know why I am such an idiot to keep purchasing them again. My last 5 year warranty blanket lasted two years (I also purchased it on Amazon) - I don't know why I didn't return it; I just sucked up the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Taylor

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BLANKET...PLEASE READ!
customer_reviews.text: This electric blanket arrived December 20...it’s a lovely blanket in all ways, EXCEPT for the fact that due to the ‘plush’ finish, we fight it ALL night long trying to get it to stay on the bed! It creeps from one side to the other, interrupting our sleep 2-3 times each night as we wake up shivering. Today is Feb 4th, and unfortunately I just discovered there was also a very short window of time (Jan 31) to qualify for a return, VERY disappointed! Will be contacting Customer Service at Sunbeam as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Works well and some useful features
customer_reviews.text: The blanket itself worked well and had some useful features such as the preheat function which automatically reverted to the selected level of heat and the dual control which allows the different sides of the bed to be set at different levels. However, the light weight and velvet texture allowed the blanket to slip off the bed quite easily. Moreover, why can't the design a control pad that doesn't fall off the bedside stand with every tug on the cord?
customer_reviews.author: Dave the Rave

customer_reviews.title: Messy Bed
customer_reviews.text: When the time had come to buy a new electric blanket, I thought ah Sunbeam that's the best! I read all the reviews. The biggest complaint was that it didn't stay on the bed. I didn't think that would be a problem since In sleep alone. WHAT A MISTAKE---not only do you have to tear the bed apart every morning, there are times that u have to straighten the bed out thru the nite. I love the quality but would never buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Eyes

customer_reviews.title: This thing will spoil you!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an old one that finally died - I love sleeping in a cold room, but really hate jumping into a cold bed. Some great features: 1. Preheat mode - my old blanket would stay on preheat for an hour - this new one does so for only 30 minutes (works just fine). 2. Option of leaving on all the time or automatically cutting off after 10 hours - my old blanket did not have the option of leaving on all the time. 3. After 30 minutes of preheat, it drops back to your preset temperature.
customer_reviews.author: basicblur

customer_reviews.title: Heats well but is Annoying!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket heats up very well and that is good. But, it is the most annoying blanket I've ever used. It slides all over the place, I wake up with my sheets almost on the floor, the blanket all over one side. I don't want to go to bed to wrestle with my blanket!!! I'm putting it in our guestroom and ordering a heated mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: MINDY BYINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Don't get shocked.
customer_reviews.text: I got a P.O.S. It worked well at first. Then shocked the S___ out of my wife. She was beyond upset. My side worked fine. I hated sending it back. I'll give one another try this winter.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars to zero stars within a year
customer_reviews.text: Turned into a pile of crap within one year. Return process not user friendly. Will never buy Sunbeam again
customer_reviews.author: Ken Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but there are some flaws
customer_reviews.text: The connector is in an unfortunate location, centered at the top of the blanket. One could turn the blanket around, but then the controllers would have to be at the foot of the bed. The controllers are extremely lightweight, so the weight of the cord can/will pull them off of the nightstand. Still, we enjoy our blanket and use it frequently. Would I buy it again when this one goes out? Nay. I'll get the heated mattress pad instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: From the start have had operating problems with the blanket. When I called their customer service, a recording says to call back at another time. Over and over. No customer service. Might be a good product if it worked properly. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: fanman

customer_reviews.title: They just don't make um like they use to.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket started out perfect for me. It was soft to the touch, great fit for my bed and the most important to me.......it was warm!!!! Two and a half weeks later it wasn't warm when I jumped in bed anymore. Then about a month after that, half of one side stopped getting warm. Now, 4 month later, one controler changes temperature by itself during the night. Of course it goes down because I have to have it on high just to feel some warmth. I've owned a Sunbeam electric blanket before. It worked great and lasted for 10 years. That's why I bought this one. They just don't make um like they use to.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine costa

customer_reviews.title: The fabric that this blanket is made of is very "slick" it tends to slide all over the bed very easily. Every morning when I mak
customer_reviews.text: Okay this blanket works well. My problem with it is this. The fabric that this blanket is made of is very "slick" it tends to slide all over the bed very easily. Every morning when I make the bed the blanket has slide one way and the comforter on top of it has slide the total other way! We have a queen size bed and I have to pull everything back into place and it honestly drives me nuts! I'm not a fan of this blanket but it does "work" technically well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Frey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this is you like wasting money
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I didn't realize it was a "disposable" electric blanket. In other words, don't expect it to work for very long before you have have to buy another (under a year). Sure it turns on, sure it appears to work, does it heat my bed?...No, it does not heat my bed. I tried contacting Sunbeam so I could get it repaired/replaced as it is supposed to have a 5 year warranty. I expect it takes 6 years for them to respond so no benefit there. It's unfortunate that Sunbeam dominates the market and there are very few alternatives...maybe I'll just add more blankets to my bed instead. Signed Cold and Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mummerpop

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy but slippery
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Large temp range but I start on high. Only problem is it does slip around and away from me as the fabric does not stay in place all night like a wool blanket. My old sunbeam was a different more wool like blanket and stayed in Place. I find my duvet and sheet in place and the electric blanket balled up between my husband and me! Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: a satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in first year, had to pay half the ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke in first year, had to pay half the price in shipping and wait to get another. AND. AS MANY HAVE SAID, IT SLIDES OUT FROM BETWEEN THE SHEET AND BEDSPREAD. EVERY.NIGHT. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: MovieBuff2008

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: for what this blanket costs, I didn't expect it to stop working within 3 months of purchase. I've checked the wire connections and made sure everything was connected correctly still, I'm pretty sure only 3 or 4 wires heated up slightly when I have the setting on high. Never again Sunbeam.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Angeli

customer_reviews.title: Heavier blanket and too slippery
customer_reviews.text: Blanket was very soft & plush to the touch. Both sides heated up with no problems. We liked the preheat option & auto shutoff. Only problem we had was that we couldnt keep it on top of us. Kept sliding off sides or end of bed or in between us. Blanket was well made but felt much heavier than any other blanket we've ever had. Maybe that was cause of problem. After 3 nights fighting with it we decided to return it. We have used electric blankets for 50 years and never had a problem with this before.
customer_reviews.author: Sukaree

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Love the dual controls, I don't want the heat on but husband does, Blanket feels very soft to touch and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald c. Ivers

customer_reviews.title: Lovely blanket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep at our daughter's house for when we visit. I love it so much, I am ready to order one for home. Our current blanket is working fine, but the fabric is pilling. This new one is so soft and the decorative edging is elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! Light weight. Dual controls a huge plus as my wife likes the temperature on her side warmer. The "preheat" setting is terrific, crawling into nice warm bed on a cold night. I would definitely buy again and recommend it highly. It's nice getting something you paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comforting
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sunbeam heated blanket replacing one that was quite old and coming apart at the seams but still functioning OK. The blanket material is a great improvement and as advertised is luxurious, soft and velvety. We are impressed with these improvements and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Two have gone bad
customer_reviews.text: The second blanket is not working. Was told by sunbeam to check their website for a replacement. Been months. When are replacements going to be available
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this blanket may make that worse.
customer_reviews.text: This is a *really* warm blanket, without using the electric part of it. We've had it for maybe 6 weeks, and I only turned on my side of the blanket for the first time last night. My husband uses the heat setting nightly. Slippage: If your blankets do not normally slide off the bed, you should not have any problems. If your blankets end up on the floor regularly, this blanket may make that worse.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie M

customer_reviews.title: It is very annoying and frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Although the heating blanket works, the velvet material makes the blanket slip and slide down the foot of our bed, then either my side or my husband's side of the bed. I am a light sleeper. Whenever I feel that the blankets aren’t right, I have to get up to fix them or I am unable to go back to sleep. I get up 2 or 3 times a night to fix the blanket. It is very annoying and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: WSHinCO

customer_reviews.title: Warm and nice but sadly caused issues
customer_reviews.text: So this was a gift and my mother loves it. Unfortunately she has been breaking out on her chest and her dermatologist has suggested it's the heat blanket. Unfortunately there are so few settings she can no longer use it. A setting for a shorter time would be much more helpful.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very soft plush blanket
customer_reviews.text: It is a very soft and plush blanket. It is heavier than I expected and warmer than anticipated. Because it is a rather heavy blanket (seems like a "weighted" blanket) it's easy to get too warm. I use the L setting and still get too warm at times. It heats up fast which I like. I like to "preheat" to warm the bed before I get in bed. Overall a very nice blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far , so good. OOPs. Not so good now.
customer_reviews.text: Warms up quickly and uniformly. Hope it lasts, unlike some other brands we have purchased. OK, we had this over the winter, and wouldn't you know it, it started not working on one side. So, we are down grading our review to a 1 since Amazon will not let less than that be left for a review. Another product from China that didn't live up to expectations. Of course, it is to late to take advantage of any guarantee. My suggestion is to buy a item like this from a local store that will honor their products they sell
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: Blanket "walks"
customer_reviews.text: This blanket does not stay in place overnight. Because there is a nap on the back of the blanket that is side-to-side directional it gradually shifts to one side of the bed as people move in their sleep. To me this is an INCURABLE defect. We've used electric blankets from Sunbeam and a couple of others for 54 years, this is a first. I do not like it. Absolutely recommend against buying this Velvet plush one.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET MILLER

customer_reviews.title: It feels wonderful. It works well
customer_reviews.text: It feels wonderful. It works well. My only complaint is the size. It is not as wide as my old one. My husband and I are not large people. We both like to sleep on our sides. Once the two of us are under the covers the blanket barely covers us.
customer_reviews.author: Terrioresa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this blanket
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this blanket! Words can't truly describe how very soft this blanket is. this is not the first or only Sunbeam electric blanket I own. Any future blanket purchase will be from this seller and will be this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: OKMH

customer_reviews.title: We should have got one a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: We used to have an electric blanket 25 years ago when we lived in Colorado. It was great. I forgot how warm it feels to have this blanket preheated before bedtime on a cold night. The dials are easy to use and I keep my side control on 5 and hubs has his on 7. We sleep so much better especially when we go RV camping.
customer_reviews.author: Kukana

customer_reviews.title: A little difficulty at first but solved
customer_reviews.text: Originally I couldn't get this to work at all. So I called Sunbeam, gave me instructions to plug directly into an outlet, also had to reset, but since that time have had no problem and I would recommended to anyone. For older people with weakness due to arthritis or other problems it is a little hard to plug into the blanket itself, also hard to remove, but I suppose that is more for safety.
customer_reviews.author: TKP

customer_reviews.title: Better then great and so soft it's even slick.  Company good response...
customer_reviews.text: Love-love-it. I get cold easy and this really saves on heating bill. The company was very good in responding to me when I had a problem setting up the 5 year warranty. They had it set up and got it right to me. I love that that in a company. Good, fast personal service.
customer_reviews.author: Lotacats

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the fabric is so slippery it slides off the bed no matter if on top or under a quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: One that works
customer_reviews.text: Have problems one side heat other does not changed controller sides still only one side (same) heats now one control blinking f2
customer_reviews.author: colleen huddleston

customer_reviews.title: My legs does better it the blanket is really warm when I go ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not get very warm. I have RLS and I need a blanket that will warm up and stay that way. My legs does better it the blanket is really warm when I go to bed. It is not happening with this blanket. Am I doing something wrong. I set it on High and do the Preheat, that does not help. Thanks for any help!!
customer_reviews.author: Clara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thick and warm
customer_reviews.text: This must be the thickest blanket in the world. I don't much need to turn it on, because it's so warm all by itself. Feels really nice. Love the color. Cat likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Belinda Yandell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ELECTRIC BLANKET
customer_reviews.text: GREAT ELECTRIC BLANKET, bought 2 last year and then this year I bought one more! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Angella Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and comfy and simple to wash.
customer_reviews.text: Very plush. My 10 year old sleeps with this blanket even during the summer (!!). I like hers (a twin size) better than mine (a queen size) because there are two cords for mine and sometimes my feet gets tangled in them. But oh man, it saved me during the winter and I couldn't wait to jump into a cozy bed. Simple to wash, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb13

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice electric dual control blanket. The fabric has a tendency to creep across the bed which requires a little more attention when making the bed, but no big deal. Would recommend this blanket for its softness and warmth when needed during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not light weight.
customer_reviews.text: The softness is very nice. The softness also makes it very slippery and it uncovers one of us nearly every night. The instructions are pretty specific as to how you should set up the controls. After speaking with a customer rep I went ahead and did it just the way I had done it with our previous blanket. Not near as light weight as our previous wool blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slippery, doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: As several reviews mentioned, the blanket is very slippery. It keeps sliding off the bed, even if you don't toss and turn. Making the bed in the morning takes a long time, as you wrestle the blanket back into place. It worked fine as far as heating went, and felt soft, but we ended up taking it off our bed and putting it on a seldom-used bed, where our poor guests will have to struggle with it. (Sorry, guests!)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the best heating pad that Ivhave ever owned. The size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Burton

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and very soft and comfortable. The dual controls make it easy to let my husband have his side warm while I can turn my side off.
customer_reviews.author: cjk

customer_reviews.title: Never a special occasion gift.
customer_reviews.text: Alot of picks and pulls to the blanket finish. Causes holes in the cover. Give for a need not as a gift. Warmth good and controls easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie W Barnett

customer_reviews.title: The controls are easy to you
customer_reviews.text: You can heat up one side or all of this Queen-sizes blanket. The controls are easy to you. Automatically turns off after a certain amount of time. Between “high” and “low” settings there are 20 different intervals. The cord is several feet long. The material is very soft, but you can feel the cords through it slightly. This doesn’t bother me at all, but it might bother someone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect gift. It's soft to the touch, easy to use & love the preheat setting feature. I also liked the way it came double boxed to protect during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Maria

customer_reviews.title: Be rested and refreshed with up to an hour less sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I already bought an earlier version of the Sunbeam Queen Size with a single controller. This version with dual controls was clearly an improvement and a real joy to have. The blanket is soft. I notice that with an electric blanket, I get more restful sleep and wake up an hour sooner. The sleeping improvement is definitely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Technical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Warm winter nights.
customer_reviews.text: Gave then as gifts which were met with mixed responses. One was afraid to lay on electric cords and refused to use it, the other side just loved it as he worked in the cold and enjoyed the warmth when he went to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Crawls right off the bed
customer_reviews.text: have to agree with others, this blanket will crawl right off the bed! it works well but the sliding is intollerable! this one will be going to Good Will!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: This blanket will definitely keep you warm on cold nights ...
customer_reviews.text: This blanket will definitely keep you warm on cold nights. My only caution would be to order a larger size. We have a Queen bed and ended up getting a King down the road just so that we could have a larger blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric blanket with no electric
customer_reviews.text: 1st one lasted a year... they replaced it... 2nd one didn’t work consistently on one side.., now both sides failed.
customer_reviews.author: BigDave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great only problem with it is it slides around a llot on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Moore

customer_reviews.title: No to be re-repurchased eldd Ed ctruv blanket.
customer_reviews.text: The heat from this is inconsistent, patchy and overall insufficient. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: lynne-marie jackson

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was wonderful....for about three months. Now it has stopped warming up completely. I can't believe I spent so much money on this product with a 5 year warranty just to have it quit after 3 months. Very disappointed. How do I contact Sunbeam to complain?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Very warm electric blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Temp control is great. Blanket is medium weight, heavier than others I have owned, and has a definite nap which tends to pull any bed covers to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is a great way to shop and find things at reasonable prices
customer_reviews.text: It was for my back bedroom that stays cold in the winter, and it’s more economical to use than a space heater I bought on Amazon a few months ago , I’d like to return the space heater, but I guess I’m past the 30 day return policy ???
customer_reviews.author: Chris lawson

customer_reviews.title: I was great and I was so excited
customer_reviews.text: I received this in early December. I was great and I was so excited. Now, only half the blanket heats. Extremely disappointed for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Synthetic fabric with slimy, slippery feel - fails to ...
customer_reviews.text: Synthetic fabric with slimy, slippery feel - fails to stay put and often ends up on the floor. Also very heavy and fails to breathe. Got rid of it!
customer_reviews.author: John V. Weil

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have had this for two winters now. Its a great blanket, nice even heat, the wife stays warm and I barely use my side. It is a bit slippery because of the material, but its soooo cozy to climb into at night. I've had several electric blankets and this is by far the best I've had. Great deal I love it.
customer_reviews.author: john hishon

customer_reviews.title: Weighs too much
customer_reviews.text: Plush but far too heavy at 13 pounds for the blanket alone (without the controls and cables). Advertised as being 6 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Raydtek

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I got this blanket as a Christmas present and am completely obsessed! The velvet is sooo soft and so far its been heating really well. It does get warmer at the bottom of the blanket than the top, but I like it cause my feet are always cold. The highest setting I've used was 14 and had to turn it down cause it was too hot. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plush!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Machine washable. If the remotes are marked L & R, I did not see it so we had to seap remotes after we plugged it in. Better than the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Cute

customer_reviews.title: Material Quality Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Heating quality is very good and rates a 4 star or better. The problem is the blanket slides off the bed and we have to get up at least twice per night to put it back in place. Apparently it is the material that is causing it to slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Don Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The blanket is great, preheat warms the bed nicely before going to ...
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is great, preheat warms the bed nicely before going to bed, turn to low and the bed is warm all night! The blanket itself is soft and heavy enough if you don't need the heat, just the blanket itself is cozy! We are very pleased with the blanket and the price was in line with others we had looked out! Delivery was prompt!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Pate

customer_reviews.title: great blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is thick and soft and we don't feel the wires and connectors like we did on our old blanket. This has a preheat setting and then it automatically goes to whatever setting you had on it previously. The blanket is well-made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Armand Jalbert

customer_reviews.title: One has to turn the light to change the settings. I prefer the non-digital model, so I returned it
customer_reviews.text: One has to turn the light to change the settings. I prefer the non-digital model, so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: rwx

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy another
customer_reviews.text: This product is a disappointment to me. The controls are not reliable. One side of the bed works. The other side seldom works. It does not heat very well also. I have another brand in my RV Which a cheaper model, but works much better, this one was a poor choice
customer_reviews.author: Stephen MarksOld Timer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my heated blanket!!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for quite some time to find the perfect heated blanket. This has dual controls and also preheats which is AH-MAZING!!! Great product for a reasonable price! Quality of the blanket is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Done, Quite Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm; we keep this in our motorhome which does not always have the best heat available. Put it on our bed and it keeps us comfortable all night.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tadlock

customer_reviews.title: Ahh heat in the winter!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, not sure what others have complained about but this thing heats up in a flash and the quality seems very solid. I'd recommend this to others
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!! Only thing I would add ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it!! Only thing I would add is a right and left identification on the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the product stopped working. The error shown means that basically the product cannot be fixed not even after a reset.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian A. Costea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!! Wasn't cheap
customer_reviews.text: Used this last winter, didn't seem to heat properly....put away for summer, just got it out again, and it does not heat properly. I should have returned this last winter, too late now! Disappointed!! Wasn't cheap!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Heated Blanket and very plush.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. Very soft, looks good, easy to use, and the temperature controls have worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Morehead

customer_reviews.title: NICE VALUE
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is a lot softer than I expected and is very cozy.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Bunches up
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has the option to stay on, but it moves to the middle of the bed and bunches up there. Otherwise, I’d give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 3.5mths after use
customer_reviews.text: Three and a half months after use, one side has stopped working so only one side is getting heat! I had a similar experience with sunbeam brand many years ago and thought I would give this brand one more try, I will NOT but this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 weeks, very dissatisfied! Missed the return window, Want an electric blanket and have no idea what to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get to not on low, have to beat the bed and turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Ralph

customer_reviews.title: My 5th Sunbeam blanket I have owned. Every aspect of this one is the BEST.
customer_reviews.text: The fleece material is outstanding. I also like the 20 temp settings. Most available offer only 10. The preheat heats up rapidly. Controls are easy to work and read. Enough said. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: name is to be with held

customer_reviews.title: Dual setting ability.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the blanket is great. However, the blanket needs weights in the corners so when one person turns over majority of the blanket moves. Otherwise, the blanket is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm!
customer_reviews.text: THe blanket is very soft, wires are very small. Only had it a month but so far works very good!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Nelson

customer_reviews.title: There is no heat to speak of and i am not comfortable and I only put my blanket on the 5th ...
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on a pourch in NJ in the middle of winter. There is no heat to speak of and i am not comfortable and I only put my blanket on the 5th setting. Its great to put it on top of a top sheet tho. I find it helps desperse the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice for a Heated Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. You can read my review of the green blanket and get all the information you need. Just be careful of the color. The color you will get is not the color in the picture. Other than the color, I love the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Clean

customer_reviews.title: simply amazing. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Life!!!! simply amazing. I love it. I turn it on b4 I hope in the shower then when I get back to my room my bed is nice and toasty.. my room is huge and it gets super cold. the heated blanket feels like when u take ur clothes out the dryer and u lay under them.. except the clothes stay warmmm! great gift to myself.
customer_reviews.author: drewford

customer_reviews.title: This electric blanket became defective after a couple of months ...
customer_reviews.text: This electric blanket became defective after a couple of months or so. Trying to replace by the company under warranty has been very frustrating. This is the second time I bought a Sunbeam electric blanket to find defective within the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great but is very heavy . but that works for some people/
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The blanket is great. The only drawback is that it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is great. The only drawback is that it has a rough corded binding across the top. Would have been nicer with a softer product. Works great, good price, and quick service.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Snavely

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice purchase. Performs as advertised. Only had it one month so can speak for long term reliability.
customer_reviews.author: James Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Broke in two months of use
customer_reviews.text: Loved it when it worked. In only two months in one of the sides stopped working. Submitted claim to seller with no result.
customer_reviews.author: Eve N

customer_reviews.title: Patioents required to unack and install wiring.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease after installation to use the Blanket. The instructions were easy to follow and it worked the first time tried.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard J. Brodigan

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on the bed
customer_reviews.text: The blanket heated very nicely. BUT.... you can't keep it on the bed! It is so slick that you'll find it slides off the bed during the night even tho it's between the sheet and bedspread. Returned..
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Everything from the instructions to operation were great. Item received ahead of schedule by several days. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: hayday

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery, but heats very well
customer_reviews.text: It is very slippery, sliding around under my comforter. But it heats very well
customer_reviews.author: michael opps

customer_reviews.title: Warm and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Electric blanket awesome warm soft and downright very comfortable..I did buy a second one for my guest bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Nice snuggy blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket has a variety of settings so my husband and I can make our respective 'sides' perfect. It is soft and easy to connect. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: irisheyes1125

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel of the blanket ie softness and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of the blanket ie softness and I believe will be very durable; not so good as it slides off the bed easily although sandwiched between the sheet and the comfortor .
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Keeping someone warm in  Novelty, Ohio
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift , She loves it. The winter temperatures are brutal in the snowbelt . Just turn it on a half hour before you retire and as you slip into bed, you'll say "Oohhhhh "
customer_reviews.author: Finbarr

product_meta.title: Sunbeam - Queen Size Heated Blanket Luxurious Velvet Plush with 2 Digital Controllers and Auto-Off Feature - 5yr Warranty (Mushroom Beige)
product_meta.description:
Indulge in the rich softness of the Queen Size Sunbeam Premium Soft Velvet Plush Heated Blanket in Beige color. The beautiful ultra-soft Velvet Plush fabric is smooth to the touch. Hemmed edges finish off the blanket with sophistication. Wrap yourself in luxurious warmth throughout the night. With 20 personalized heat settings prepare for a restful night of soothing comfort and elegance. The thermofine warming system of the blanket monitors temperature and auto-adjusts to keep the level of warmth consistent throughout the night. Sunbeam blankets are a smart way to cut energy costs as well. They allow you to save up to 10 percent a year on your heating bills by turning on your heated blanket and setting your thermostat down by 10-15 percent for 8 hours while sleeping. Made of 100 percent polyester, the blanket presents a soft surface that is smooth and soothing to the touch. The blanket includes 20 heating levels, while an easy-to-operate control makes it simple to find exactly the right setting. Queen Blanket comes with dual controls and selectable Auto-off and Preheat Featuure. For easy care, the blanket is fully machine washable and dryer safe. Also includes a 5 Year Limited Warranty from Sunbeam. Queen (84 in x 90 in).

Indulge in the rich softness of the Queen Size Sunbeam Premium Soft Velvet Plush Heated Blanket Size: Queen (84" X 90") (213 cm X 228 cm) With Preheat and 20 personalized heat settings prepare for a restful night of soothing comfort and elegance The thermofine warming system of the blanket monitor
